definition: light petroleum product (i.e. gasoline and diesel oil)
pinyin: qing1 zhi4 shi2 you2 chan3 pin3
jin1 rong2 yan3 sheng1 chan3 pin3

sentences.english: So what happens in the very likely event they find more tainted products?
sentences.chinese: 那么，如果在整治中发现了更加有害的产品呢？

sentences.english: EarthSound's products have an excellent track record in the States.
sentences.chinese: 天籁的产品在美国有非常辉煌的过去。

sentences.english: We also do import and export business in chemicals and agricultural products.
sentences.chinese: 我公司还经营化学产品和家产品进出口的业务。

sentences.english: We also do import and export business in chemicals and agricultural products.
sentences.chinese: 我公司还经营化学产品和家产品进出口的业务。

sentences.english: Wants efficient changeovers between products with minimum downtime.
sentences.chinese: 用最少时间进行产品间转换。

sentences.english: Are new products and services being offered that were not a part of the old site?
sentences.chinese: 还是提供的新产品和服务不属于旧的网站的一部分？

sentences.english: Some of Pedini collections includes nice re-invent of inline kitchen layouts.
sentences.chinese: 一些佩蒂尼的产品包含了重新发明的内嵌厨具布局。

sentences.english: There are new spin-off products aimed at older girls and women, such as sun screen and cosmetics.
sentences.chinese: 该集团还推出了太阳镜和化妆品等新的副产品。

sentences.english: The Distributor is authorized to sub-contract and assign the distribution and sales of the Products to sub-contractors of Fangyuan Group.
sentences.chinese: 发行人已授权转包及销售此产品给方园集团的转包商。

sentences.english: Conflow supplies high pressure underground equipment for coal mines.
sentences.chinese: 康福路为煤矿领域提供井下耐高压产品。

sentences.english: The distance of the braiding product is not adjustable. If necessary, the gear to be replaced shall be adjusted.
sentences.chinese: 编带产品间距不可调，如果需要调整要更换齿轮。

sentences.english: The major technique norms have over taken those of importations.
sentences.chinese: 主要技术指标超过原进口产品。

sentences.english: Not all products might have the same route through the supply chain.
sentences.chinese: 并非所有产品都沿着相同的路径通过供应链。

sentences.english: Do you think it's worth paying so much for designer products?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得为设计师的产品花那么多钱值得吗？

sentences.english: Our products are unique in style and various in color.
sentences.chinese: 公司产品风格独具，独树一帜，花色品种繁多。

sentences.english: An edible wild herbs production processing base is proposed to be constructed.
sentences.chinese: 拟建山野菜生产加工基地，产品销往国内外。
